items.sentence: Tom looked at the price tag and realized he didn\'t have enough money.
Early to bed and early to rise, makes a man healthy, wealthy and wise.
When I was asked by an old man where the church was, I pointed it out.
I think Tom was trying to make something to eat when we came to visit.
I thought you wanted to eat at that Chinese restaurant on Park Street.
Tom claimed that his gun was stolen the week before Mary was murdered.
Tom can\'t taste the difference between expensive wine and cheap wine.
It was Tom\'s car, not mine, that broke down the day before yesterday.
Last night\'s concert was one of the best concerts I\'ve ever been to.
Tom wanted to stay home and relax instead of hiking with his children.
